data.name: Warface – Flor de Muerto Pack
data.detailed_description:
This package contains the following items:


  • AS -"VAL" + Flor de Muerto camo

  • UTAS UTS-15 + Flor de Muerto camo

  • Beretta MX4 Storm + Flor de Muerto camo

  • Barrett M98B + Flor de Muerto camo

  • GROM Rifleman body camo

  • GROM Medic body camo

  • GROM Engineer body camo

  • GROM Sniper body camo

This pack offers a deadly assortment of weapons and body camo - one per game's class. Pick up "Flor de Muerto" weapons, equip elite unit's GROM gear and bring doom to all those who oppose you!

MORE ABOUT THE WEAPONS:


Assault Rifle - AS -"VAL". USSR-designed AS-"VAL" is an assault rifle with an integrated suppressor. Since its development in the late 1980s, it has been used by different Russian and Soviet forces like the Spetsnaz, MVD, FSB and some units of the Russian Army. It is part of the Soviet Army and the KGB since 1987.

Shotgun - UTAS UTS-15. After a request back in 2006, UTAS UTS-15 has been developed to create the ultimate police shotgun. It is a pump-action, less than 30"" long weapon.

Submachine gun - Beretta MX4 Storm. Beretta MX4 is the latest product of one of the world’s oldest arms companies. It uses an original blowback-operated action and features a polymer body, fixed shoulder stock and ambidextrous controls.

Sniper rifle - Barrett M98B. Produced by Barrett Firearms Manufacturing, M98B is a bolt-action sniper rifle chambered in.338 Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm).

MORE ABOUT THE BODY CAMO:


GROM is a special operations unit of the Polish Armed Forces. This elite unit is deployed in various spec-ops and unconventional warfare missions.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
